languages.text: "Вашему вниманию предоставляется вокс-запись кардинала Анвиласа, помилованного "Вольным Торговцем". Его задержали в соборе, на трупах сорока прихожан, которых он умертвил собственноручно". {n}Префект щелкает пальцами, и к ней подлетает сервочереп.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
Если играет этюд VC_SaintCardinal
После куя к префекту подлетает сервочереп.

Если играет этюд VC_SaintCardinal
После куя к префекту подлетает сервочереп.

languages.text: "Let me present to you a vox-recording of Cardinal Anvylas, who was pardoned by the 'Rogue Trader,' only to be detained at the cathedral next to the bodies of forty members of his congregation slain at his hand." {n}The prefect snaps her fingers, and a servo-skull flies up to her.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вашему вниманию предоставляется вокс-запись кардинала Анвиласа, помилованного "Вольным Торговцем". Его задержали в соборе, на трупах сорока прихожан, которых он умертвил собственноручно". {n}Префект щелкает пальцами, и к ней подлетает сервочереп.{/n}

"Let me present to you a vox-recording of Cardinal Anvylas, who was pardoned by the 'Rogue Trader,' only to be detained at the cathedral next to the bodies of forty members of his congregation slain at his hand." {n}The prefect snaps her fingers, and a servo-skull flies up to her.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich möchte Euch eine Vox-Aufzeichnung von Kardinal Anvylas vorspielen, der {mf|vom 'Freihändler'|von der 'Freihändlerin'} begnadigt wurde, nur um dann bei der Kathedrale neben den Leichen von vierzig Mitgliedern seiner Gemeinde, die er selbst getötet hatte, verhaftet zu werden." {n}Die Präfektin schnippt mit den Fingern, und ein Servoschädel fliegt zu ihr.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let me present to you a vox-recording of Cardinal Anvylas, who was pardoned by the 'Rogue Trader,' only to be detained at the cathedral next to the bodies of forty members of his congregation slain at his hand." {n}The prefect snaps her fingers, and a servo-skull flies up to her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte Euch eine Vox-Aufzeichnung von Kardinal Anvylas vorspielen, der {mf|vom 'Freihändler'|von der 'Freihändlerin'} begnadigt wurde, nur um dann bei der Kathedrale neben den Leichen von vierzig Mitgliedern seiner Gemeinde, die er selbst getötet hatte, verhaftet zu werden." {n}Die Präfektin schnippt mit den Fingern, und ein Servoschädel fliegt zu ihr.{/n}

languages.text: « Voici un enregistrement du cardinal Anvylas, pardonné par "{mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}", avant d'être détenu à la cathédrale, près des cadavres des 40 membres de congrégation qu'il a assassinés. » {n}La préfète claque des doigts, et un servocrâne vole vers elle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let me present to you a vox-recording of Cardinal Anvylas, who was pardoned by the 'Rogue Trader,' only to be detained at the cathedral next to the bodies of forty members of his congregation slain at his hand." {n}The prefect snaps her fingers, and a servo-skull flies up to her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Voici un enregistrement du cardinal Anvylas, pardonné par "{mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}", avant d'être détenu à la cathédrale, près des cadavres des 40 membres de congrégation qu'il a assassinés. » {n}La préfète claque des doigts, et un servocrâne vole vers elle.{/n}

languages.text: “我在此播放一份来自红衣主教安维拉斯本人的音阵录音。行商浪人赦免了他，但他却被软禁在了大教堂里。他身边摆着四十具信徒的尸体，这些信徒都是被主教大人亲手杀害的。”{n}行政官打了个响指，一颗伺服头骨朝她飞了过去。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let me present to you a vox-recording of Cardinal Anvylas, who was pardoned by the 'Rogue Trader,' only to be detained at the cathedral next to the bodies of forty members of his congregation slain at his hand." {n}The prefect snaps her fingers, and a servo-skull flies up to her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我在此播放一份来自红衣主教安维拉斯本人的音阵录音。行商浪人赦免了他，但他却被软禁在了大教堂里。他身边摆着四十具信徒的尸体，这些信徒都是被主教大人亲手杀害的。”{n}行政官打了个响指，一颗伺服头骨朝她飞了过去。{/n}

languages.text: «Permítanme presentarles una grabación por voco del cardenal Anvylas, que recibió el perdón de{mf|l| la} "Comerciante Independiente" para después ser detenido en la catedral junto a los cuerpos de cuarenta miembros de su congregación, a los que había asesinado». {n}La prefecta chasca los dedos y un servocráneo vuela hasta ella.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let me present to you a vox-recording of Cardinal Anvylas, who was pardoned by the 'Rogue Trader,' only to be detained at the cathedral next to the bodies of forty members of his congregation slain at his hand." {n}The prefect snaps her fingers, and a servo-skull flies up to her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Permítanme presentarles una grabación por voco del cardenal Anvylas, que recibió el perdón de{mf|l| la} "Comerciante Independiente" para después ser detenido en la catedral junto a los cuerpos de cuarenta miembros de su congregación, a los que había asesinado». {n}La prefecta chasca los dedos y un servocráneo vuela hasta ella.{/n}

languages.text: {n}「『ローグトレーダー』に恩赦を受けた後、自らの手で殺害した信者40名の遺体とともに大聖堂に拘束されたアンビラス枢機卿のヴォクス記録をお聞かせしましょう」{/n}総監が指を鳴らすと、サーヴォスカルが彼女のもとへ飛んできた。
languages.original_text: "Let me present to you a vox-recording of Cardinal Anvylas, who was pardoned by the 'Rogue Trader,' only to be detained at the cathedral next to the bodies of forty members of his congregation slain at his hand." {n}The prefect snaps her fingers, and a servo-skull flies up to her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}「『ローグトレーダー』に恩赦を受けた後、自らの手で殺害した信者40名の遺体とともに大聖堂に拘束されたアンビラス枢機卿のヴォクス記録をお聞かせしましょう」{/n}総監が指を鳴らすと、サーヴォスカルが彼女のもとへ飛んできた。

languages.text: "Size 'Hür Tacir' tarafından bağışlanan, Kardinal Anvylas'a ait bir voks kaydını sunayım. Bağışlanmasından kısa süre sonra katedralde cemaate ait kırk cesedin yanında yakalanmıştır." {n}Prefekt parmaklarını şıklatıyor, bir hizmelet ona doğru havalanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Let me present to you a vox-recording of Cardinal Anvylas, who was pardoned by the 'Rogue Trader,' only to be detained at the cathedral next to the bodies of forty members of his congregation slain at his hand." {n}The prefect snaps her fingers, and a servo-skull flies up to her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Size 'Hür Tacir' tarafından bağışlanan, Kardinal Anvylas'a ait bir voks kaydını sunayım. Bağışlanmasından kısa süre sonra katedralde cemaate ait kırk cesedin yanında yakalanmıştır." {n}Prefekt parmaklarını şıklatıyor, bir hizmelet ona doğru havalanıyor.{/n}
